"About \"Valentine Points\".": "I will explain \"Valentine Points\" to you.  The Naura Cake Shop has opened in the deepest part of The Caves. There are already plenty of ARKS members heading over there."

"We want to prevent them from getting into trouble. If you save them, we will give you \"Valentine Points\" as a show of thanks.  If you manage to collect [214] \"Valentine Points\" within the time limit, you will complete this quest."
"Please try to collect as many \"Valentine Points\" as you can to complete the quest."
